summary: High-severity security vulnerability (CVSS 9.8) in transitive dependency bumpalo-3.11.0 due to use-after-free in Vec::into_iter() lifetime constraints. The vulnerability exists in OpenTelemetry 0.18.0 through its dependency chain.
userImpact: Users of the SDK are exposed to a critical use-after-free vulnerability that could allow remote code execution with high confidence, requiring urgent dependency updates.
rootCause: Lifetime of iterator produced by Vec::into_iter() in bumpalo-3.11.0 is not constrained to the Bump lifetime, causing use-after-free when iterator is used after Bump is dropped.
proposedFix: Upgrade bumpalo to version 3.11.1 or later
resolutionDetails: Dependency was updated to a version with the fix applied
keyQuote: Dependency has updated a very long time ago.
